Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People in Australia are demanding action regarding issues such as affordable healthcare corporate regulation and renewable energy. Many doctors are calling for increased funding for Medicare and bulk billing in the upcoming Federal Budget. Meanwhile regulators such as ASIC are being criticized for their slow response to corporate wrongdoing and a report has stated that billions of dollars have been lost to scam artists. Additionally there are calls for the government to prioritize renewable energy with a large investment needed to meet the nation's Paris Agreement targets.
